dmca.title: [ABUSE] Cease & Desist, Net Enforcers, Inc. on behalf of Crutchfield Corporation (www
dmca.body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.
- --
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/aup.html


- -------- Original Message --------
Received:         from [172.16.214.180] (helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by
mail.theplanet.com with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim
4.50) id 1DEE0A-0002yO-Sj for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Wed, 23 Mar 2005
16:06:59 -0600
Received:         from spooling.theplanet.com ([69.56.141.4]
helo=lili.theplanet.com) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from
abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com) with smtp (Exim) id 1DEE07-000LBa-3c
for abuseadm@theplanet.com; Wed, 23 Mar 2005 16:06:58 -0600
Received:         (qmail 3524 invoked from network); 23 Mar 2005 22:06:54
-0000
Received:         from unknown (HELO ?216.185.111.52?) (172.16.214.110) by
lili.theplanet.com with SMTP; 23 Mar 2005 22:06:52 -0000
Received:         from [172.16.214.180] (helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by
mail.theplanet.com with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim
4.50) id 1DEDzx-0002vf-VN for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 23 Mar 2005
16:06:46 -0600
Received:         from mail.netenforcers.com ([129.250.227.177]
helo=netenforcers.com) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from
Crutchfield.Management@netenforcers.com) with esmtp (Exim) id
1DEDzq-000Kpo-8c for abuse@theplanet.com; Wed, 23 Mar 2005 16:06:45 -0600
Received:         from ADAMBMARISSA [68.153.203.224] by netenforcers.com with
ESMTP (SMTPD32-8.05) id A6662D100B2; Wed, 23 Mar 2005 16:57:58 -0500
From:         Net Enforcers - Crutchfield Management Team
<Crutchfield.Management@netenforcers.com>
To:         <lumavanossi@vol.com.br>
Date:         Wed, 23 Mar 2005 17:05:44 -0500
MIME-Version:         1.0
Content-Type:         multipart/mixed;
boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0079_01C52FCA.8DA7A280"
X-Mailer:         Microsoft Office Outlook, Build 11.0.5510
Thread-Index:         AcUv9HW6wlR++EngRz+j+HWm3GER0g==
X-MimeOLE:         Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2180
Message-Id:         <200503231657405.SM01220@ADAMBMARISSA>
X-Declude-Sender:         Crutchfield.Management@netenforcers.com
[68.153.203.224]
X-Note:         This E-mail was scanned by Colony One Spam Trap
(www.colony1.net) for spam.
Received-SPF:         none (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: 129.250.227.177 is
neither permitted nor denied by domain of netenforcers.com)
client-ip=129.250.227.177;
envelope-from=Crutchfield.Management@netenforcers.com;
helo=netenforcers.com;
Cc:         abuse@theplanet.com
Subject:         [ABUSE] Cease & Desist, Net Enforcers, Inc. on behalf of
Crutchfield Corporation (www.mercado1.net)
X-BeenThere:         abuse@lists.theplanet.com
X-Mailman-Version:         2.1.5
Precedence:         list
List-Id:         abuse.lists.theplanet.com
List-Unsubscribe:         <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=unsubscribe>
List-Post:         <mailto:abuse@lists.theplanet.com>
List-Help:         <mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=help>
List-Subscribe:         <http://lists.theplanet.com/mailman/listinfo/abuse>,
<mailto:abuse-request@lists.theplanet.com?subject=subscribe>
Sender:         abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
Errors-To:         abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com



- ------------------------------------------------------------------------



3/23/2005



Re: _Violation of Crutchfield New Media Copyright_





Dear Sir/Madam:



~            It has come to our attention that you are using copyrighted
text and/or images from our web site, Crutchfield.com.  We have reviewed
your site *(www.mercado1.net <http://www.mercado1.net>)* and have made
copies that show your verbatim copying of large portions of our web site
including, but not limited to,



http://mexico.mercado1.net/itens/k/kenwood_nuevo_2005_kdc_mp228_cd_mp3_wma_s
uper_precio_wow__7879091_promocao.php



~            As a web site owner that has copyrighted its own web site, I
am convinced that Marco Pereira is aware of how concerned we are by this
use of our copyrighted work.  Each and every page of our web site has a
clearly marked copyright notice.  We are hereby placing Marco Pereira on
notice that this work is a valuable asset of Crutchfield New Media and
that we intend to vigorously enforce our copyrights.  Crutchfield New
Media has spent vast sums of money in creating this site and has no
intention of allowing our intellectual property to be used in violation
of state and federal copyright laws.



~            I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I
am an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain
intellectual property rights, said owner being named [Crutchfield New
Media, LLC] ("IP Owner"). I have a good faith belief that the listings
or materials listed herein are not authorized by the above IP Owner, its
agent, or the law and therefore infringe the IP Owner's rights according
to state, federal, or United States law. We are hereby requesting that
you discontinue the use of all Crutchfield New Media copyrighted
material immediately.  If the offending material is not removed we will
have no choice but to pursue appropriate legal action against you.



Note that we are sending a copy of this letter to your internet service
provider, ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. to place them on legal
notice that you are violating our intellectual property rights and that
by allowing this material to remain posted it is contributing to the
infringement of our rights under federal and state laws.



~            If you have any questions on this matter you may contact me
at 1-434-817-1000, extension 2452.





Sincerely,





Ronald Solomon

In House Counsel

Crutchfield Corporation


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFCSPUrvK/XpJs6oyURAgMwAJ9GOv+hekXEP5apakiPXbCb/nw3jQCfaZs5
wqyOkrCooYhVWCxitNp9g4A=
=GNCJ
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
